attr.name: zimbraHsmAge
attr.desc: Minimum age of mail items whose filesystem data will be moved to secondary storage (nnnnn[hmsd]).

attr.name: zimbraId
attr.desc: Zimbra Systems Unique ID

attr.name: zimbraAccountStatus
attr.desc: account status (TODO: enumerate valid values here)

attr.name: zimbraMailAddress
attr.desc: RFC822 email address of this recipient for accepting mail

attr.name: zimbraMailHost
attr.desc: the server hosting the accounts mailbox

attr.name: zimbraNotes
attr.desc: administrative notes

attr.name: zimbraMemberOf
attr.desc: for group membership, included with person object

attr.name: zimbraMailForwardingAddress
attr.desc: RFC822 forwarding address for an account

attr.name: zimbraMailDeliveryAddress
attr.desc: RFC822 email address of this recipient for local delivery

attr.name: zimbraCOSId
attr.desc: COS zimbraID

attr.name: zimbraMailStatus
attr.desc: mail delivery status (enabled/disabled)

attr.name: zimbraMailQuota
attr.desc: mail quota in bytes

attr.name: zimbraPrefMailSignature
attr.desc: mail signature

attr.name: zimbraPrefMailSignatureEnabled
attr.desc: mail signature enabled

attr.name: zimbraDomainName
attr.desc: name of the domain

attr.name: zimbraMailAlias
attr.desc: RFC822 email address of this recipient for accepting mail

attr.name: zimbraCOSInheritedAttr
attr.desc: zimbraCOS attrs that get inherited in a zimbraAccount

attr.name: zimbraPrefSaveToSent
attr.desc: whether or not to save outgoing mail

attr.name: zimbraLmtpAdvertisedName
attr.desc: name to use in greeting and sign-off; if empty, uses hostname

attr.name: zimbraLmtpBindPort
attr.desc: port number on which LMTP server should listen

attr.name: zimbraLmtpBindAddress
attr.desc: interface address(es) on which LMTP server should listen; if empty, binds to all interfaces

attr.name: zimbraLmtpNumThreads
attr.desc: number of handler threads, should match MTA concurrency setting for this server

attr.name: zimbraIsAdminAccount
attr.desc: set to true for admin accounts

attr.name: zimbraMailSieveScript
attr.desc: sieve script generated from user filter rules

attr.name: zimbraPasswordMinLength
attr.desc: minimum length of a password

attr.name: zimbraPasswordMaxLength
attr.desc: max length of a password

attr.name: zimbraPasswordMinAge
attr.desc: minimum days between password changes

attr.name: zimbraPasswordMaxAge
attr.desc: maximum days between password changes

attr.name: zimbraPasswordEnforceHistory
attr.desc: whether or not to enforce password history. Number of unique passwords a user must have before being allowed to re-use an old one. A value of 0 means no password history.

attr.name: zimbraPasswordHistory
attr.desc: historical password values

attr.name: zimbraPasswordModifiedTime
attr.desc: time password was last changed

attr.name: zimbraAliasTargetId
attr.desc: zimbraId of alias target

attr.name: zimbraPasswordMustChange
attr.desc: must change password on auth

attr.name: zimbraAuthMech
attr.desc: mechanism to use for authentication

attr.name: zimbraAuthLdapURL
attr.desc: LDAP URL for ldap auth mech

attr.name: zimbraAuthLdapBindDn
attr.desc: LDAP bind dn for ldap auth mech

attr.name: zimbraPasswordLocked
attr.desc: user is unable to change password

attr.name: zimbraGalMode
attr.desc: should be internal (query internal only), external (external only), or both

attr.name: zimbraGalLdapURL
attr.desc: LDAP URL for external GAL queries

attr.name: zimbraGalLdapSearchBase
attr.desc: LDAP search base for external GAL queries

attr.name: zimbraGalLdapBindDn
attr.desc: LDAP bind dn for external GAL queries

attr.name: zimbraGalLdapBindPassword
attr.desc: LDAP bind password for external GAL queries

attr.name: zimbraGalLdapFilter
attr.desc: LDAP search filter for external GAL queries

attr.name: zimbraGalLdapFilterDef
attr.desc: LDAP search filter definitions for GAL queries

attr.name: zimbraGalMaxResults
attr.desc: maximum number of gal entries to return from a search

attr.name: zimbraPrefGroupMailBy
attr.desc: how to group mail by default

attr.name: zimbraPrefIncludeSpamInSearch
attr.desc: whether or not to include spam in search by default

attr.name: zimbraPrefIncludeTrashInSearch
attr.desc: whether or not to include trash in search by default

attr.name: zimbraPrefMailItemsPerPage
attr.desc: number of messages/conversations per page

attr.name: zimbraPrefOutOfOfficeReply
attr.desc: out of office message

attr.name: zimbraPrefOutOfOfficeReplyEnabled
attr.desc: whether or not out of office reply is enabled

attr.name: zimbraPrefReplyToAddress
attr.desc: address to put in reply-to header

attr.name: zimbraPrefUseKeyboardShortcuts
attr.desc: whether or not keyboard shortcuts are enabled

attr.name: zimbraServerInheritedAttr
attr.desc: zimbraServer attrs that get inherited from global config

attr.name: zimbraDomainInheritedAttr
attr.desc: zimbraDomain attrs that get inherited from global config

attr.name: zimbraServiceHostname
attr.desc: public hostname of the host

attr.name: zimbraRedoLogEnabled
attr.desc: whether redo logging is enabled

attr.name: zimbraRedoLogLogPath
attr.desc: name and location of the redolog file

attr.name: zimbraRedoLogArchiveDir
attr.desc: redolog rollover destination

attr.name: zimbraRedoLogRolloverFileSizeKB
attr.desc: redo.log file rolls over when it gets to this size

attr.name: zimbraRedoLogFsyncIntervalMS
attr.desc: how frequently writes to redo log get fsynced to disk

attr.name: zimbraPop3AdvertisedName
attr.desc: name to use in greeting and sign-off; if empty, uses hostname

attr.name: zimbraPop3BindPort
attr.desc: port number on which POP3 server should listen

attr.name: zimbraPop3BindAddress
attr.desc: interface address(es) on which POP3 server should listen; if empty, binds to all interfaces

attr.name: zimbraPop3NumThreads
attr.desc: number of handler threads

attr.name: zimbraSmtpHostname
attr.desc: the SMTP server to connect to when sending mail

attr.name: zimbraSmtpPort
attr.desc: the SMTP server port to connect to when sending mail

attr.name: zimbraSmtpTimeout
attr.desc: timeout value in seconds

attr.name: zimbraAuthTokenKey
attr.desc: auth token secret key

attr.name: zimbraPrefMailInitialSearch
attr.desc: initial search done by dhtml client

attr.name: zimbraPrefSentMailFolder
attr.desc: name of folder to save sent mail in)

attr.name: zimbraMailTrashLifetime
attr.desc: lifetime (nnnnn[hmsd]) of an item in the trash

attr.name: zimbraMailSpamLifetime
attr.desc: lifetime (nnnnn[hmsd]) of an item in the spam folder

attr.name: zimbraMailMessageLifetime
attr.desc: lifetime (nnnnn[hmsd]) of a mail message regardless of location

attr.name: zimbraContactMaxNumEntries
attr.desc: maximum number of contacts allowed in mailbox

attr.name: zimbraAuthTokenLifetime
attr.desc: lifetime (nnnnn[hmsd]) of newly created auth tokens

attr.name: zimbraAdminAuthTokenLifetime
attr.desc: lifetime (nnnnn[hmsd]) of newly created admin auth tokens

attr.name: zimbraMailMinPollingInterval
attr.desc: minimum allowed mail polling interval (nnnnn[hmsd])

attr.name: zimbraPrefMailPollingInterval
attr.desc: configured mail polling interval (nnnnn[hmsd])

attr.name: zimbraAccountClientAttr
attr.desc: additional account attrs that get returned to a client

attr.name: zimbraLastLogonTimestamp
attr.desc: rough estimate of when the user last logged in. see zimbraLastLogonTimestampFrequency

attr.name: zimbraLastLogonTimestampFrequency
attr.desc: how often (nnnnn[hmsd]) the zimbraLastLogonTimestamp is updated. if set to 0, updating zimbraLastLogonTimestamp is completely disabled

attr.name: zimbraAttachmentsBlocked
attr.desc: block all attachment downloading

attr.name: zimbraAttachmentsViewInHtmlOnly
attr.desc: view all attachments in html only

attr.name: zimbraMailHostPool
attr.desc: servers that an account can be initially provisioned on

attr.name: zimbraPrefNewMailNotificationEnabled
attr.desc: whether or not new mail notification is enabled

attr.name: zimbraPrefNewMailNotificationAddress
attr.desc: RFC822 email address for email notifications

attr.name: zimbraPrefForwardReplyPrefixChar
attr.desc: prefix character to use during forward/reply

attr.name: zimbraPrefAutoAddAddressEnabled
attr.desc: whether or not new address in outgoing email are auto added to address book

attr.name: zimbraIsMonitorHost
attr.desc: true if this server is the monitor host

attr.name: zimbraPrefReplyIncludeOriginalText
attr.desc: what part of the original message to include during replies

attr.name: zimbraPrefForwardIncludeOriginalText
attr.desc: what part of the original message to include during forwards

attr.name: zimbraFeatureContactsEnabled
attr.desc: contact features

attr.name: zimbraFeatureCalendarEnabled
attr.desc: calendar features

attr.name: zimbraFeatureTaggingEnabled
attr.desc: tagging feature

attr.name: zimbraFeatureAdvancedSearchEnabled
attr.desc: advanced search button enabled

attr.name: zimbraFeatureSavedSearchesEnabled
attr.desc: saved search feature

attr.name: zimbraFeatureConversationsEnabled
attr.desc: conversations

attr.name: zimbraFeatureChangePasswordEnabled
attr.desc: password changing

attr.name: zimbraFeatureInitialSearchPreferenceEnabled
attr.desc: preference to set initial search

attr.name: zimbraFeatureFiltersEnabled
attr.desc: filter prefs enabled

attr.name: zimbraPrefDedupeMessagesSentToSelf
attr.desc: dedupeNone|secondCopyIfOnToOrCC|moveSentMessageToInbox|dedupeAll

attr.name: zimbraPrefMessageViewHtmlPreferred
attr.desc: whether client prefers text/html or text/plain

attr.name: zimbraUserServicesEnabled
attr.desc: whether end-user services on SOAP and LMTP interfaces are enabled

attr.name: zimbraMailIdleSessionTimeout
attr.desc: idle timeout (nnnnn[hmsd])

attr.name: zimbraPrefContactsPerPage
attr.desc: number of contacts per page

attr.name: zimbraFeatureGalEnabled
attr.desc: GAL features

attr.name: zimbraNewMailNotificationFrom
attr.desc: template used to construct the sender of an email notification message

attr.name: zimbraNewMailNotificationSubject
attr.desc: template used to construct the subject of an email notification message

attr.name: zimbraNewMailNotificationBody
attr.desc: template used to construct the body of an email notification message

attr.name: zimbraGalLdapAttrMap
attr.desc: LDAP Gal attribute to contact attr mapping

attr.name: zimbraMailPort
attr.desc: HTTP port for end-user UI

attr.name: zimbraAdminPort
attr.desc: SSL port for admin UI

attr.name: zimbraPrefMailSignatureStyle
attr.desc: mail signature style outlook|internet

attr.name: zimbraMimeType
attr.desc: the MIME type (type/substype)

attr.name: zimbraMimeIndexingEnabled
attr.desc: whether or not indexing is enabled for this type

attr.name: zimbraMimeHandlerClass
attr.desc: the handler class for the mime type

attr.name: zimbraMimeFileExtension
attr.desc: the file extension (without the .)

attr.name: zimbraObjectType
attr.desc: the object type

attr.name: zimbraObjectIndexingEnabled
attr.desc: whether or not indexing is enabled for this type

attr.name: zimbraObjectStoreMatched
attr.desc: whether or not store is matched for this type

attr.name: zimbraObjectHandlerClass
attr.desc: the handler class for the object type

attr.name: zimbraObjectHandlerConfig
attr.desc: config for this type

attr.name: zimbraMailSSLPort
attr.desc: SSL port for end-user UI

attr.name: zimbraPrefContactsInitialView
attr.desc: initial contact view to use

attr.name: zimbraTableMaintenanceMinRows
attr.desc: minimum number of rows required for database table maintenance

attr.name: zimbraTableMaintenanceMaxRows
attr.desc: maximum number of rows required for database table maintenance

attr.name: zimbraTableMaintenanceOperation
attr.desc: table maintenance operation that will be performed. Valid options: "ANALYZE", "OPTIMIZE"

attr.name: zimbraTableMaintenanceGrowthFactor
attr.desc: table maintenance will be performed if the number of rows grows by this factor

attr.name: zimbraDefaultDomainName
attr.desc: name of the default domain for accounts when authenticating without a domain

attr.name: zimbraAttachmentsIndexingEnabled
attr.desc: whether or not to index attachemts

attr.name: zimbraImapEnabled
attr.desc: whether IMAP is enabled for an account

attr.name: zimbraPop3Enabled
attr.desc: whether POP3 is enabled for an account

attr.name: zimbraImapServerEnabled
attr.desc: whether IMAP server is enabled for a given server

attr.name: zimbraPop3ServerEnabled
attr.desc: whether IMAP is enabled for a server

attr.name: zimbraImapAdvertisedName
attr.desc: name to use in greeting and sign-off; if empty, uses hostname

attr.name: zimbraImapBindAddress
attr.desc: interface address(es) on which IMAP server should listen; if empty, binds to all interfaces

attr.name: zimbraImapBindPort
attr.desc: port number on which IMAP server should listen

attr.name: zimbraImapNumThreads
attr.desc: number of handler threads

attr.name: zimbraImapSSLBindAddress
attr.desc: interface address(es) on which IMAP server should listen; if empty, binds to all interfaces

attr.name: zimbraImapSSLBindPort
attr.desc: port number on which IMAP SSL server should listen on

attr.name: zimbraImapSSLServerEnabled
attr.desc: whether IMAP SSL server is enabled for a given server

attr.name: zimbraImapCleartextLoginEnabled
attr.desc: whether or not to allow cleartext logins over a non SSL/TLS connection

attr.name: zimbraPop3SSLBindAddress
attr.desc: interface address(es) on which POP3 server should listen; if empty, binds to all interfaces

attr.name: zimbraPop3SSLBindPort
attr.desc: port number on which POP3 server should listen

attr.name: zimbraPop3SSLServerEnabled
attr.desc: whether IMAP is enabled for a server

attr.name: zimbraPop3CleartextLoginEnabled
attr.desc: whether or not to allow cleartext logins over a non SSL/TLS connection

attr.name: zimbraVirusDefinitionsUpdateFrequency
attr.desc: how often (nnnnn[hmsd]) the virus definitions are updated

attr.name: zimbraPrefShowFragments
attr.desc: show fragments in conversation and message lists

attr.name: zimbraMtaAuthEnabled
attr.desc: Value for postconf smtpd_use_tls

attr.name: zimbraMtaBlockedExtension
attr.desc: Attachment file extensions that are blocked

attr.name: zimbraMtaCommonBlockedExtension
attr.desc: Commonly blocked attachment file extensions

attr.name: zimbraMtaDnsLookupsEnabled
attr.desc: Value for postconf disable_dns_lookups (note enable v. disable)

attr.name: zimbraMtaMaxMessageSize
attr.desc: Value for postconf message_size_limit

attr.name: zimbraMtaRelayHost
attr.desc: Value for postconf relayhost

attr.name: zimbraMtaTlsAuthOnly
attr.desc: Value for postconf smtpd_tls_auth_only

attr.name: zimbraSpamCheckEnabled
attr.desc: Whether to enable spam checking

attr.name: zimbraSpamKillPercent
attr.desc: Spaminess percentage beyond which a message is dropped

attr.name: zimbraSpamSubjectTag
attr.desc: Subject prefix for spam messages

attr.name: zimbraSpamTagPercent
attr.desc: Spaminess percentage beyound which a message is marked as spam

attr.name: zimbraVirusBlockEncryptedArchive
attr.desc: Whether to block archive files that are password protected or encrypted

attr.name: zimbraVirusCheckEnabled
attr.desc: Whether to enable virus checking

attr.name: zimbraVirusWarnAdmin
attr.desc: Whether to email admin on virus detection

attr.name: zimbraVirusWarnRecipient
attr.desc: Whether to email recipient on virus detection

attr.name: zimbraPrefComposeInNewWindow
attr.desc: whether or not compose messages in a new windows by default

attr.name: zimbraSpamHeader
attr.desc: mail header name for flagging spam

attr.name: zimbraSpamHeaderValue
attr.desc: regular expression for matching the spam header

attr.name: zimbraDomainType
attr.desc: should be one of: local, alias

attr.name: zimbraMailCanonicalAddress
attr.desc: RFC822 email address for senders outbound messages

attr.name: zimbraMailCatchAllAddress
attr.desc: Address to catch all messages to specified domain

attr.name: zimbraMailCatchAllForwardingAddress
attr.desc: Address to deliver catch all messages to

attr.name: zimbraMailCatchAllCanonicalAddress
attr.desc: Catch all address to rewrite to

attr.name: zimbraPrefComposeFormat
attr.desc: whether or not to compose in html or text.

attr.name: zimbraPrefForwardReplyInOriginalFormat
attr.desc: whether or not to use same format (text or html) of message we are replying to

attr.name: zimbraFeatureHtmlComposeEnabled
attr.desc: enabled html composing

attr.name: zimbraServiceEnabled
attr.desc: services that are enabled on this server

attr.name: zimbraServiceInstalled
attr.desc: services that are installed on this server

attr.name: zimbraPrefShowSearchString
attr.desc: whether to show search box or not

attr.name: zimbraRedoLogProvider
attr.desc: provider class name for redo logging

attr.name: zimbraMtaRestriction
attr.desc: restrictions to reject some suspect SMTP clients

attr.name: zimbraFileUploadMaxSize
attr.desc: Maximum size in bytes for attachments

attr.name: zimbraTimeZoneStandardDtStart
attr.desc: Start date for standard time

attr.name: zimbraTimeZoneStandardOffset
attr.desc: Offset in standard time

attr.name: zimbraTimeZoneStandardRRule
attr.desc: iCalendar recurrence rule for onset of standard time

attr.name: zimbraTimeZoneDaylightDtStart
attr.desc: Start date for daylight time

attr.name: zimbraTimeZoneDaylightOffset
attr.desc: Offset in daylight time

attr.name: zimbraTimeZoneDaylightRRule
attr.desc: iCalendar recurrence rule for onset of daylight time

attr.name: zimbraPrefTimeZoneId
attr.desc: time zone of user or COS

attr.name: zimbraPrefUseTimeZoneListInCalendar
attr.desc: whether list of well known time zones is displayed in calendar UI

attr.name: zimbraAttachmentsScanEnabled
attr.desc: Whether to scan attachments during compose

attr.name: zimbraAttachmentsScanClass
attr.desc: Class to use to scan attachments during compose

attr.name: zimbraAttachmentsScanURL
attr.desc: Data for class that scans attachments during compose

attr.name: zimbraPrefCalendarInitialView
attr.desc: initial calendar view to use

attr.name: zimbraPrefImapSearchFoldersEnabled
attr.desc: whether or not the IMAP server exports search folders

attr.name: zimbraComponentAvailable
attr.desc: Names of additonal components that have been installed

attr.name: zimbraCalendarCompatibilityMode
attr.desc: compatibility mode for calendar server

attr.name: zimbraSpamIsSpamAccount
attr.desc: When user classifies a message as spam forward message via SMTP to this account

attr.name: zimbraSpamIsNotSpamAccount
attr.desc: When user classifies a message as not spam forward message via SMTP to this account

attr.name: zimbraMailTransport
attr.desc: where to deliver parameter for use in postfix transport_maps

attr.name: zimbraSmtpSendPartial
attr.desc: Value of the mail.smtp.sendpartial property

attr.name: zimbraLogHostname
attr.desc: destination for syslog messages

attr.name: zimbraRedoLogDeleteOnRollover
attr.desc: whether logs are delete on rollover or archived

attr.name: zimbraAuthLdapSearchBase
attr.desc: LDAP search base for ldap auth mech

attr.name: zimbraAuthLdapSearchBindDn
attr.desc: LDAP search bind dn for ldap auth mech

attr.name: zimbraAuthLdapSearchBindPassword
attr.desc: LDAP search bind password for ldap auth mech

attr.name: zimbraAuthLdapSearchFilter
attr.desc: LDAP search filter for ldap auth mech

attr.name: zimbraAuthLdapExternalDn
attr.desc: explict mapping to an external LDAP dn for a given account

attr.name: zimbraAuthFallbackToLocal
attr.desc: fallback to local auth if external mech fails

attr.name: zimbraPrefHtmlEditorDefaultFontFamily
attr.desc: default font family

attr.name: zimbraPrefHtmlEditorDefaultFontSize
attr.desc: default font size

attr.name: zimbraPrefHtmlEditorDefaultFontColor
attr.desc: default font color

attr.name: zimbraPrefCalendarFirstDayOfWeek
attr.desc: first day of week to show in calendar (0=sunday, 6=saturday)

attr.name: zimbraSshPublicKey
attr.desc: Public key of this server, used by other hosts to authorize this server to login.

attr.name: zimbraLogRawLifetime
attr.desc: lifetime (nnnnn[hmsd]) of raw log rows in consolidated logger tables

attr.name: zimbraLogSummaryLifetime
attr.desc: lifetime (nnnnn[hmsd]) of summarized log rows in consolidated logger tables

attr.name: zimbraSpellCheckURL
attr.desc: URL of the server running the spell checking service. Multi-valued attribute that allows multiple spell check servers to be specified. If the request to the first server fails, a request to the second server is sent and so on.

attr.name: zimbraImapBindOnStartup
attr.desc: Whether to bind to port on startup irrespective of whether the server is enabled. Useful when port to bind is privileged and must be bound early.

attr.name: zimbraImapSSLBindOnStartup
attr.desc: Whether to bind to port on startup irrespective of whether the server is enabled. Useful when port to bind is privileged and must be bound early.

attr.name: zimbraLmtpBindOnStartup
attr.desc: Whether to bind to port on startup irrespective of whether the server is enabled. Useful when port to bind is privileged and must be bound early.

attr.name: zimbraPop3BindOnStartup
attr.desc: Whether to bind to port on startup irrespective of whether the server is enabled. Useful when port to bind is privileged and must be bound early.

attr.name: zimbraPop3SSLBindOnStartup
attr.desc: Whether to bind to port on startup irrespective of whether the server is enabled. Useful when port to bind is privileged and must be bound early.

attr.name: zimbraPrefCalendarNotifyDelegatedChanges
attr.desc: If set to true, user is notified by email of changes made to her calendar by others via delegated calendar access.

attr.name: zimbraPrefCalendarUseQuickAdd
attr.desc: whether or not use quick add dialog or go into full appt edit view

attr.name: zimbraPrefCalendarInitialCheckedCalendars
attr.desc: comma-sep list of calendars that are initially checked

attr.name: zimbraPrefCalendarAlwaysShowMiniCal
attr.desc: always show the mini calendar

attr.name: zimbraSslCaCert
attr.desc: CA Cert used to sign all self signed certs

attr.name: zimbraSslCaKey
attr.desc: CA Key used to sign all self signed certs

attr.name: zimbraCertAuthorityKeySelfSigned
attr.desc: Please see the documentation for the attribute zimbraCertAuthorityCertSelfSigned. In addition, please note that this attribute is provided at install for convenience during a test install without real certs issued by well known CAs. If you choose to create your own CA for your production uses, please note that it is a bad idea to store your CA-s private key in LDAP, as this data maybe read from zimbraGlobalConfig in the clear.

attr.name: zimbraCertAuthorityCertSelfSigned
attr.desc: When creating self-signed SSL certs during an install, we also create a local Certificate Authority (CA) to sign these SSL certs. This local CA-s own cert is then added to different applications "trusted CA-s" list/store. This attribute should not be used in a system with real certs issued by well known CAs.

attr.name: zimbraZimletKeyword
attr.desc: Server side object keyword used for indexing and search for this Zimlet

attr.name: zimbraZimletVersion
attr.desc: Version of the Zimlet

attr.name: zimbraZimletDescription
attr.desc: Zimlet description

attr.name: zimbraZimletIndexingEnabled
attr.desc: Whether server side keyword indexing enabled

attr.name: zimbraZimletStoreMatched
attr.desc: Whether store is matched for this type

attr.name: zimbraZimletHandlerClass
attr.desc: The handler class for server side Zimlet extension

attr.name: zimbraZimletHandlerConfig
attr.desc: The global config for the Zimlet

attr.name: zimbraZimletContentObject
attr.desc: The content object section in the Zimlet description

attr.name: zimbraZimletPanelItem
attr.desc: The panel item section in the Zimlet description

attr.name: zimbraZimletScript
attr.desc: URL of extra scripts used by the Zimlet

attr.name: zimbraZimletAvailableZimlets
attr.desc: List of Zimlets available to this COS

attr.name: zimbraZimletServerIndexRegex
attr.desc: Regex of content object

attr.name: zimbraMimeHandlerExtension
attr.desc: the name of the zimbra extension where the handler class for the mime type lives

attr.name: zimbraProxyAllowedDomains
attr.desc: Allowed domains for Proxy servlet

attr.name: zimbraForeignPrincipal
attr.desc: mapping to foreign principal identifier

attr.name: zimbraZimletUserProperties
attr.desc: User properties for Zimlets

attr.name: zimbraMessageCacheSize
attr.desc: Size limit in number of bytes on the message cache.

attr.name: zimbraIsDomainAdminAccount
attr.desc: set to true for domain admin accounts

attr.name: zimbraDomainDefaultCOSId
attr.desc: COS zimbraID

attr.name: zimbraDomainAdminModifiableAttr
attr.desc: account attributes that a domain administrator is allowed to modify

attr.name: zimbraZimletEnabled
attr.desc: whether this Zimlet is enabled

attr.name: zimbraZimletPriority
attr.desc: Object match priority

attr.name: zimbraProxyCacheableContentTypes
attr.desc: Content types that can be cached by proxy servlet

attr.name: zimbraZimletIsExtension
attr.desc: Whether this zimlet is an extension

attr.name: zimbraFeatureIMEnabled
attr.desc: IM features

attr.name: zimbraMtaRecipientDelimiter
attr.desc: Value for postconf recipient_delimiter. Also used by ZCS LMTP server to check if it should accept messages to addresses with extensions.

attr.name: zimbraPreAuthKey
attr.desc: preauth secret key

attr.name: zimbraMailMode
attr.desc: whether to run HTTP or HTTPS or both or mixed mode. See also related attributes zimbraMailPort and zimbraMailSSLPort

attr.name: zimbraMtaAuthHost
attr.desc: Host running SOAP service for use by MTA auth. Setting this sets zimbraMtaAuthURL via attr callback mechanism.

attr.name: zimbraMtaAuthURL
attr.desc: URL at which this MTA (via zimbra saslauthd) should authenticate. Set by setting zimbraMtaAuthHost.

attr.name: zimbraMtaMyNetworks
attr.desc: value of postfix mynetworks

attr.name: zimbraFeatureViewInHtmlEnabled
attr.desc: option to view attachments in html

attr.name: zimbraAccountCalendarUserType
attr.desc: calendar user type - USER (default) or RESOURCE

attr.name: zimbraCalResType
attr.desc: calendar resource type - Location or Equipment

attr.name: zimbraCalResAutoAcceptDecline
attr.desc: Whether this calendar resource accepts/declines meeting invites automatically; default TRUE

attr.name: zimbraNotifyServerEnabled
attr.desc: Whether notification server should be enabled.

attr.name: zimbraNotifyBindAddress
attr.desc: Network interface on which notification server should listen; if empty, binds to all interfaces.

attr.name: zimbraNotifyBindPort
attr.desc: Port number on which notification server should listen.

attr.name: zimbraNotifySSLServerEnabled
attr.desc: Whether SSL notification server should be enabled.

attr.name: zimbraNotifySSLBindAddress
attr.desc: Network interface on which SSL notification server should listen; if empty, binds to all interfaces

attr.name: zimbraNotifySSLBindPort
attr.desc: Port number on which notification server should listen.

attr.name: zimbraCalResAutoDeclineIfBusy
attr.desc: Whether this calendar resource declines invite if already busy; default TRUE

attr.name: zimbraCalResAutoDeclineRecurring
attr.desc: Whether this calendar resource declines invites to recurring appointments; default FASE

attr.name: zimbraCalResLocationDisplayName
attr.desc: display name for resource location

attr.name: zimbraGroupId
attr.desc: Zimbra Systems Unique Group ID

attr.name: zimbraCalResSite
attr.desc: site name

attr.name: zimbraCalResBuilding
attr.desc: building number or name

attr.name: zimbraCalResFloor
attr.desc: floor number or name

attr.name: zimbraCalResRoom
attr.desc: room number or name

attr.name: zimbraCalResCapacity
attr.desc: capacity

attr.name: zimbraCalResContactName
attr.desc: name of contact in charge of resource

attr.name: zimbraCalResContactEmail
attr.desc: email of contact in charge of resource

attr.name: zimbraCalResContactPhone
attr.desc: phone number of contact in charge of resource

attr.name: zimbraMessageIdDedupeCacheSize
attr.desc: Size of cache for delivery time dedupe based on Message-Id header. Set to 0 to disable this type of deduping.

attr.name: zimbraFeatureSharingEnabled
attr.desc: enabled sharing

attr.name: zimbraRemoteManagementCommand
attr.desc: Path to remote management command to execute on this server

attr.name: zimbraRemoteManagementUser
attr.desc: Login name of user allowed to execute remote management command

attr.name: zimbraRemoteManagementPrivateKeyPath
attr.desc: Private key this server should use to access another server

attr.name: zimbraRemoteManagementPort
attr.desc: Port on which remote management sshd listening on this server.

attr.name: zimbraMailURL
attr.desc: URL prefix for where the zimbra app resides on this server

attr.name: zimbraPrefCalendarApptReminderWarningTime
attr.desc: number of minutes (0 = never) before appt to show reminder dialog

attr.name: zimbraFeatureMailForwardingEnabled
attr.desc: enable end-user mail forwarding features

attr.name: zimbraPrefMailForwardingAddress
attr.desc: RFC822 forwarding address for an account

attr.name: zimbraPrefMailLocalDeliveryDisabled
attr.desc: whether or not to deliver mail locally

attr.name: zimbraLocale
attr.desc: locale of entry, e.g. en_US

attr.name: zimbraMailboxLocationBeforeMove
attr.desc: serverId:mboxId of mailbox before being moved

attr.name: zimbraFeatureMobileSyncEnabled
attr.desc: whether to permit mobile sync

attr.name: zimbraImapProxyBindPort
attr.desc: port number on which IMAP proxy server should listen

attr.name: zimbraImapSSLProxyBindPort
attr.desc: port number on which IMAPS proxy server should listen

attr.name: zimbraPop3ProxyBindPort
attr.desc: port number on which POP3 proxy server should listen

attr.name: zimbraPop3SSLProxyBindPort
attr.desc: port number on which POP3S proxy server should listen

attr.name: zimbraVirtualHostname
attr.desc: An alias for this domain, used to determine default login domain based on URL client is visiting

attr.name: zimbraHideInGal
attr.desc: hide entry in Global Address List

attr.name: zimbraFeatureSkinChangeEnabled
attr.desc: Whether changing skin is allowed for this account or in this cos

attr.name: zimbraPrefSkin
attr.desc: Skin to use for this account

attr.name: zimbraFeatureNotebookEnabled
attr.desc: Whether notebook feature should be allowed for this account or in this cos

attr.name: zimbraShareInfo
attr.desc: items an account has shared

attr.name: zimbraGalInternalSearchBase
attr.desc: LDAP search base for interal GAL queries (special values: "ROOT" for top, "DOMAIN" for domain only, "SUBDOMAINS" for domain and subdomains)

attr.name: zimbraFeatureGalAutoCompleteEnabled
attr.desc: enable auto-completion from the GAL, zimbraFeatureGalEnabled also has to be enabled for the auto-completion feature

attr.name: zimbraGalAutoCompleteLdapFilter
attr.desc: LDAP search filter for external GAL auto-complete queries

attr.name: zimbraNotebookAccount
attr.desc: Account for storing templates and providing space for public wiki

attr.name: zimbraAvailableSkin
attr.desc: Skins available for this account

attr.name: zimbraDebugInfo
attr.desc: For selective enabling of debug logging

attr.name: zimbraFeatureOutOfOfficeReplyEnabled
attr.desc: Whether out of office reply feature should be allowed for this account or in this cos

attr.name: zimbraFeatureNewMailNotificationEnabled
attr.desc: Whether new mail notification feature should be allowed for this account or in this cos

attr.name: zimbraInstalledSkin
attr.desc: Skins installed and available on all servers (this is global config only)

attr.name: zimbraNotebookPageCacheSize
attr.desc: The size of composed Wiki / Notebook page cache on the server.

attr.name: zimbraNotebookFolderCacheSize
attr.desc: The size of Wiki / Notebook folder cache on the server.

attr.name: zimbraNotebookMaxCachedTemplatesPerFolder
attr.desc: The maximum number of cached templates in each Wiki / Notebook folder cache.

attr.name: zimbraPrefGalAutoCompleteEnabled
attr.desc: whether end-user wants auto-complete from GAL. Feature must also be enabled.

attr.name: zimbraNetworkLicense
attr.desc: Contents of a signed Zimbra license key - an XML string.

attr.name: zimbraNetworkActivation
attr.desc: A signed activation key that authorizes this installation.

attr.name: zimbraIsSystemResource
attr.desc: Indicates the account is a resource used by the system such as spam accounts or Notebook accounts.

attr.name: zimbraPublicServiceHostname
attr.desc: Name to be used in public API such as REST or SOAP proxy.

attr.name: zimbraPasswordLockoutEnabled
attr.desc: whether or not account lockout is enabled.

attr.name: zimbraPasswordLockoutDuration
attr.desc: how long an account is locked out. Use 0 to lockout an account until admin resets it

attr.name: zimbraPasswordLockoutMaxFailures
attr.desc: number of consecutive failed login attempts until an account is locked out

attr.name: zimbraPasswordLockoutFailureLifetime
attr.desc: the duration after which old consecutive failed login attempts are purged from the list, even though no successful authentication has occurred

attr.name: zimbraPasswordLockoutLockedTime
attr.desc: the time at which an account was locked

attr.name: zimbraPasswordLockoutFailureTime
attr.desc: this attribute contains the timestamps of each of the consecutive authentication failures made on an account

attr.name: zimbraPrefOutOfOfficeFromDate
attr.desc: out of office notifications (if enabled) are sent only if current date is after this date

attr.name: zimbraPrefOutOfOfficeUntilDate
attr.desc: out of office notifications (if enabled) are sent only if current date is before this date

attr.name: zimbraPrefOutOfOfficeCacheDuration
attr.desc: server remembers addresses to which notifications have been sent for this interval, and does not send duplicate notifications in this interval

attr.name: zimbraPrefOutOfOfficeDirectAddress
attr.desc: per RFC 3834 no out of office notifications are sent if recipients address is not directly specified in the To/CC headers - for this check, we check to see if To/CC contained accounts address, aliases, canonical address. But when external accounts are forwarded to Zimbra, and you want notifications sent to messages that contain their external address in To/Cc, add those address, then you can specify those external addresses here.

attr.name: zimbraHttpProxyURL
attr.desc: the http proxy URL to connect to when making outgoing connections (Zimlet proxy, RSS/ATOM feeds, etc)

attr.name: zimbraPasswordMinUpperCaseChars
attr.desc: minimum number of upper case characters required in a password

attr.name: zimbraPasswordMinLowerCaseChars
attr.desc: minimum number of lower case characters required in a password

attr.name: zimbraPasswordMinPunctuationChars
attr.desc: minimum number of ascii punctuation characters required in a password

attr.name: zimbraPasswordMinNumericChars
attr.desc: minimum number of numeric characters required in a password

attr.name: zimbraTextAnalyzer
attr.desc: The registered name of the Zimbra Analyzer Extension for this account to use

attr.name: zimbraPrefReadingPaneEnabled
attr.desc: whether reading pane is shown by default

attr.name: zimbraPrefUseRfc2231
attr.desc: When composing and sending mail, whether to use RFC 2231 MIME parameter value encoding. If set to FALSE, then RFC 2047 style encoding is used.

attr.name: zimbraPrefShortcuts
attr.desc: keyboard shortcuts

attr.name: zimbraXMPPEnabled
attr.desc: Enable XMPP support for IM

attr.name: zimbraDomainAdminMaxMailQuota
attr.desc: maximum amount of mail quota a domain admin can set on a user

attr.name: zimbraVersion
attr.desc: account version information

attr.name: zimbraDomainMaxAccounts
attr.desc: maximum number of accounts allowed in a domain

attr.name: zimbraPrefFromDisplay
attr.desc: personal part of email address put in from header

attr.name: zimbraPrefFromAddress
attr.desc: email address to put in from header

attr.name: zimbraPrefReplyToDisplay
attr.desc: personal part of email address put in reply-to header

attr.name: zimbraPrefReplyToEnabled
attr.desc: TRUE if we should set a reply-to header

attr.name: zimbraPrefWhenSentToEnabled
attr.desc: TRUE if we should look at zimbraPrefWhenSentToAddresses

attr.name: zimbraPrefWhenSentToAddresses
attr.desc: addresses that we will look at to see if we should use an identity

attr.name: zimbraPrefWhenInFoldersEnabled
attr.desc: TRUE if we should look at zimbraPrefWhenInFolderIds

attr.name: zimbraPrefWhenInFolderIds
attr.desc: if replying/forwarding a message in this folder, use this identity

attr.name: zimbraPrefUseDefaultIdentitySettings
attr.desc: TRUE if we this identity should get settings from the default identity

attr.name: zimbraPrefBccAddress
attr.desc: address that we will bcc when using sending mail with this identity

attr.name: zimbraPrefIdentityName
attr.desc: name of the identity

attr.name: zimbraPrefForwardReplyFormat
attr.desc: what format we reply/forward messages in.

attr.name: zimbraIdentityMaxNumEntries
attr.desc: maximum number of identities allowed on an account

attr.name: zimbraFeatureIdentitiesEnabled
attr.desc: whether to allow use of identities feature

attr.name: zimbraFeaturePop3DataSourceEnabled
attr.desc: whether user is allowed to retrieve mail from an external POP3 data source

attr.name: zimbraDataSourceId
attr.desc: Unique ID for a data source

attr.name: zimbraDataSourceName
attr.desc: Descriptive name of the data source

attr.name: zimbraDataSourceEnabled
attr.desc: Whether or not the data source is enabled

attr.name: zimbraDataSourceHost
attr.desc: Host name of server

attr.name: zimbraDataSourcePort
attr.desc: Port number of server

attr.name: zimbraDataSourceUsername
attr.desc: Username on server

attr.name: zimbraDataSourcePassword
attr.desc: Password on server

attr.name: zimbraDataSourceFolderId
attr.desc: Local folder id to store retreived data in

attr.name: zimbraDataSourceConnectionType
attr.desc: Which security layer to use for connection (cleartext, ssl, starttls)

attr.name: zimbraDataSourceMaxNumEntries
attr.desc: Maximum number of data sources allowed on an account

attr.name: zimbraAllowAnyFromAddress
attr.desc: Whether this account can use any from address. Not changeable by domain admin to allow arbitrary addresses

attr.name: zimbraAllowFromAddress
attr.desc: Addresses that this account can as from address if arbitrary-addresses-allowed setting is not set

attr.name: zimbraArchiveAccount
attr.desc: Mailboxes in which the current account in archived. Multi-value attr with eg values { user-2006@example.com.archive, user-2007@example.com.archive } that tells us that user@example.com has been archived into those two mailboxes.

attr.name: zimbraArchiveMailFrom
attr.desc: Address to which archive message bounces should be sent. Typically could be an admin account. This is global across all domains.

attr.name: zimbraArchiveAccountNameTemplate
attr.desc: An account or CoS setting - typically only in CoS - that tells the archiving system how to derive the archive mailbox name. ID, USER, DATE, and DOMAIN are expanded.

attr.name: zimbraArchiveAccountDateTemplate
attr.desc: An account or CoS setting that works with the name template that allows you to dictate the date format used in the name template. This is a Java SimpleDateFormat specifier. The default is an LDAP generalized time format:

attr.name: zimbraPrefIdentityId
attr.desc: Unique ID for an identity

attr.name: zimbraDataSourceLeaveOnServer
attr.desc: Specifies whether imported POP3 messages should be left on the server or deleted.

attr.name: zimbraSmtpSendAddOriginatingIP
attr.desc: Whether X-Originating-IP will be added to messages sent via SendMsgRequest.

attr.name: zimbraFeatureTasksEnabled
attr.desc: whether to allow use of tasks feature

attr.name: zimbraSyncWindowSize
attr.desc: The maximum batch size for each ZimbraSync transaction. Default value of 0 means to follow client requested size. If set to any positive integer, the value will be the maximum number of items to sync even if client requests more. This setting affects all sync categories including email, contacts, calendar and tasks.

attr.name: zimbraAccountExtraObjectClass
attr.desc: Object classes to add when creating a zimbra account object. Useful if you want to add sambaSamAccount etc to zimbra accounts.

attr.name: zimbraPrefLocale
attr.desc: user locale preference, e.g. en_US Whenever the server looks for the user locale, it will first look for zimbraPrefLocale, if it is not set then it will fallback to the current mechanism of looking for zimbraLocale in the various places for a user. zimbraLocale is the non end-user attribute that specifies which locale an object defaults to, it is not an end-user setting.

attr.name: zimbraImapDisabledCapability
attr.desc: disabled IMAP capabilities. Capabilities are listed on the CAPABILITY line, also known in RFCs as extensions

attr.name: zimbraImapSSLDisabledCapability
attr.desc: disabled IMAP SSL capabilities. Capabilities are listed on the CAPABILITY line, also known in RFCs as extensions

attr.name: zimbraBackupTarget
attr.desc: Default backup target path

attr.name: zimbraBackupReportEmailRecipients
attr.desc: Backup report email recipients

attr.name: zimbraBackupReportEmailSender
attr.desc: Backup report email From address

attr.name: zimbraBackupReportEmailSubjectPrefix
attr.desc: Backup report email subject prefix

attr.name: zimbraExcludeFromCMBSearch
attr.desc: Indicates the account should be excluded from Crossmailbox searchers.

attr.name: zimbraAutoSubmittedNullReturnPath
attr.desc: Use null return path for envelope MAIL FROM when sending out of office and new mail notifications. If false, use account address for envelope

attr.name: zimbraMtaMyHostname
attr.desc: value of postfix myhostname

attr.name: zimbraMtaMyOrigin
attr.desc: value of postfix myorigin

attr.name: zimbraHttpNumThreads
attr.desc: number of http handler threads

attr.name: zimbraHttpSSLNumThreads
attr.desc: number of https handler threads

attr.name: zimbraMtaMyDestination
attr.desc: value of postfix mydestination
